subject: Re: [SAMBA 4] compilation without LDAP
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

mokhtar schrieb:
> Hi
> 
> Is it possible to compile samba 4 without LDAP libraries ?

Hi,

samba4 has it's own LDAP and KRB5 builtin-libraries,
so it doesn't need external libraries for it.

That means it should compile, if not please report us
the error messages and we'll try to fix the problem.

metze
